item.title: ONE OK ROCK - Mighty Long Fall (映画"るろうに剣心 京都大火編")
item.description:
When we met

the pain

Stood still

It was us

Then suddenly

it’s where’d you go?

The system blew

I knew

This side of me

I want a little more

But inside it seems

I’m just a little boy

Nothing else

Don’t go

It’s

a mighty long fall

When you thought

love was the top woh

Oh no

it’s a wake up call

When your life

went into shock woh-

It seems like

gravity

Keeps pulling us

back down woh

Don’t go it’s

a mighty long fall

When you know

time is up woh woh
